summary: A small mod with a small unmarked quest to free a dragon who will sell you a new bow and arrows
descriptionHtml:
This small mod adds a new bow and narrows to the game and a small mini unmarked quest to earn it.

The mini quest starts in Dragon Bridge, in the local inn there look around for something weird...

Far as I know there shouldn't be any conflicts or huge bugs. It's not perfect and the quest was just meant to add a unique way to get it. Included I will give a readme that gives a step by step on how to get the bow if the in-game notes are not enough.

You'll kill about three new enemies, collect items and create a key.

The bow and arrows are just a tiny bit stronger then elven.

To install just copy meshes, textures and the Khajiitbow Esp into your data folder, make sure it's checked and play!

Credits: Without these guys things would be even more ugly.

Violet: [b]Kjell Granlund[/b]            

Bow: [b]Andrej12[/b]            

Arrows: [b]PSlayer[/b]            

Kuna and Sumeu: [b]Ironman5000[/b]
author: Wolflady500
